tool_description: This API provides live gold and silver prices for various locations.This API provides a convenient and up-to-date source of information for individuals and businesses interested in tracking the live gold and silver prices in various locations.
title: Gold Silver live prices

api_list.name: getSilverPriceHistory
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the silver price history for a specific location up to 1800 days. A "place" parameter must be included in the request to specify the desired location, and a "no_of_days" parameter must be included to specify the number of days of history to retrieve. The response is returned in JSON format and includes the silver price history for the specified location and number of days.

api_list.name: getSilverRate
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the current silver rate for a specific location. A "place" parameter must be included in the request to specify the desired location. The response is returned in JSON format and includes the current silver rate for the specified location.

api_list.name: getGoldPriceHistory
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the gold price history for a specific location up to 1800 days. A "place" parameter must be included in the request to specify the desired location, and a "no_of_days" parameter must be included to specify the number of days of history to retrieve. The response is returned in JSON format and includes the gold price history for the specified location and number of days.

api_list.name: getGoldRate
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the current gold rate for a specific location. A "place" parameter must be included in the request to specify the desired location. The response is returned in JSON format and includes the current gold rate for the specified location.

api_list.name: getAllPlaces
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of all the available locations for which gold and silver prices can be retrieved. The response is returned in JSON format and includes a list of all the locations.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gold-silver-live-prices.p.rapidapi.com/getAllPlaces"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gold-silver-live-prices.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
